scripts.upgrade: yarn upgrade-interactive && yarn --cwd packages-prod/example run upgrade
scripts.test: npm --prefix packages/addon run test && npm --prefix packages/example-v8 run test
scripts.check: concurrently --timings --prefix-colors auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run lint" "npm run check-types" "yarn format"
scripts.prepublish:base: npm run build:addon && concurrently --timings --prefix-colors auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run lint" "npm run check-types" "yarn format" "npm --prefix packages/addon run test" "npm --prefix packages/example-v8 run test"
